name: Game Attack
description: Play three different games in one app. Play City Sweep, save your city from destruction from flying bombs. Play Star Ship save your ship from space ships shooting at it. Play Monster Fight, destroy robots moving in the background, firing at you, and look out above in the ceiling, a monster comes out to strike at you. Use your finger to press on screen to shoot and kill your enemies. Save your universe. Click on the Amazon link below, to download MC Games to your Android device.
